name: The Horny Power of RainyDays
description:
This is just a little game that I made for my good friend RainyDays because I wanted a challenge to get better at using RPG Maker. This entire project took me in total 3 days to make while working on it for around 3 hours a day. I had a blast making this and it wouldn't have been possible without all of the people in the game and my friends helping me with the dialogue creation.

Here's all my friends socials if you want them

Waffle: Discord: waffle#0408 Twitter: @wafflewild

Felice: (Said she doesn't want her socials here, sorry!)

Jen: Discord: miranda ♡#5281 Twitter: @YourLocal6Digit

Rainy: Discord: RainyDays#5951 Twitter: @rainydays_osu

Alix: Discord: alix#2320 Twitter: @alixowo

And me of course: Discord: Vegas Blue#5280 Twitter: @Minatarre

Feel free to message me if you want me to make you your own game or have any questions about my experiences with game maker!
